diff_hunk:
@@ -152,11 +202,27 @@ message DeviceOption {
 // Operator Definition.
 message OperatorDef {
   repeated string input = 1; // the name of the input blobs
+  // we plan to support named inputs in schema, and this extension is for the
+  // named inputs
+  // if inputs are positional, just leave mapped_inputs empty
+  // if (some) inputs are named in the schema, the positional inputs have
+  // empty string as place holder in mapped_inputs, and the named inputs
+  // have their schema input names at the correponding postition in
+  // mapped_inputs
+  repeated string mapped_inputs = 11;
   repeated string output = 2; // the name of output top blobs
+  // we plan to support named outputs in schema, and this extension is for the
+  // named outputs
+  // if outputs are positional, just leave mapped_outputs empty
+  // if (some) outputs are named, the positional outputs have empty string
+  // as place holder in mapped_outputs, and the named inputs have names
+  // in mapped_outputs
+  repeated string mapped_outputs = 12;
body: Will remove the prematured design here as well.
body_html: Will remove the prematured design here as well.
body_text: Will remove the prematured design here as well.
